verses.1: Ka ta aw, kong thuhilhte mangngilh kei inla, kong thugente phawk tawntung in.
verses.2: Kong thuhilhte in na khan hong sausak dinga, hong daupaisak ding hi.
verses.3: Thumanna le cihtakna khahsuah ngei kei inla, na ngawng ah tuate okin, na lungtang tungah gelh in.
verses.4: Tua hileh, Pasianʼ mai le miteʼ mai ah maipha ngahin na maa vang ding hi.
verses.5: Na lungsim khempeuh tawh Topa muang inla, nangʼ theihna suang kei in.
verses.6: Na hihna khempeuh ah amah phawk in. Tua hileh lampi man amah in hong lak ding hi.
verses.7: Nangmah a pilin kingaihsun tawm kei inla, Topa zahtakin a sia peel in.
verses.8: Tua hileh nang adingin damna zatui tawh kibang dinga, na meimate hong damsakin na natnate hong daisak ding hi.
verses.9: Na neihsa le na anpalte tawh Topa zahtak in.
verses.10: Tua hileh na ansalte an tawh kidim dinga, beel dimletin leenggahzu na nei ding hi.
verses.11: Ka ta aw, Topaʼ thuhilhna limtakin ngai-in, hong tainate thudon in.
verses.12: Bang hang hiam cih leh pa in a pahtak a tapa a thuhilh bangin Topa in a it mite a thuhilh hi.
verses.13: Pilna nei-in thu a thei mipa, a lungdam mi ahi hi.
verses.14: Pilna nei leeng ngun sangin hoih zaw a, kham sangin zong manpha zaw hi.
verses.15: A manpha pen suangmanpha nangawn sangin pilna manpha zaw lai a, mihingteʼ deih theih na lakah tehpih theih ding om lo hi.
verses.16: Pilna in khan hong sausak a, hauhna le pahtawina zong hong pia thuah lai hi.
verses.17: Pilna in nuntakna hong nuamsak a, lungmuang takin hong omsak den hi.
verses.18: Pilna a nei mite a lungdam mi hi a, pilna a nei mite nuntakna singkung tawh kibang uh hi.
verses.19: Topa in pilna tawh leitung bawl a, a theihtelna tawh vantung a bawl hi.
verses.20: Ama pilna in gun tuite luangsak a, meiite in leitungah guah zusak hi.
verses.21: Ka ta aw, pilna le thu ngaihsut theihna len tawntung inla, cikmah ciangin khahsuah ngei kei in.
verses.22: Tuate pen nang adingin nuntakna hi dinga, na hoih nadingin kizepna hi ding hi.
verses.23: Tua hileh lungmuang takin na nungta dinga, puk nading thu bangmah om lo ding hi.
verses.24: Launa om loin nuam takin na lum dinga, zan tawntung lungmuang takin na ihmu thei ding hi.
verses.25: Migilote tungah huihpi bangin siatna a tun ciangin, nang na lunghihmawhna ding bangmah om lo ding hi.
verses.26: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a muanhuai-in nang hong kem dinga, siatna hong tuaksak lo ding hi.
verses.27: Na hih zawh ding ahih nakleh midangteʼ kitangsapna huh tawntung in.
verses.28: Na vaihawmsak theih pah ding thute ahih nakleh, zing ciangin hong paikik in, ci-in a hun sot to kei in.
verses.29: Nangmah hong muangin nangma nai ah a hong teeng na veengpa, gim a ngah nading bangmah vaihawm kei in.
verses.30: Nangma tungah siatna bangmah a hong bawl lo, mi khatpeuh tawh thu om lopi-in kimawk tot kei in.
verses.31: A ngongtat thei mite eng kha kei inla, amauʼ gamtat bangin gamta kha kei in.
verses.32: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a sia-in a gamtate mudah a, thuman mite bek a pawlpih dingin a la hi.
verses.33: Topa in migiloteʼ inn sung samsia a, thuman miteʼ inn sung thupha a pia hi.
verses.34: Amah in mi kihisakte bangmahin sim lo a, a kiniamkhiatte tungah maipha a pia hi.
verses.35: Mipilte in minphatna le pahtawina ngah ding uh a, mihaite in maizumna le mindaina ngah ding uh hi.
